metadata.title: CVE-2021-3739 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A process with CAP_SYS_ADMIN can cause a kernel NULL pointer dereference in btrfs code. It was discovered that the btrfs file system in the Linux kernel did not properly handle removing a non-existent device id. An attacker with CAP_SYS_ADMIN could use this to cause a denial of service.
